Class MenuController

application.controllers.MenuController

public class MenuController
extends java.lang.Object

  • Method Details

    • menu

      @RequestMapping(value="menu", method=GET) public java.lang.String menu​(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @CookieValue(value="table",defaultValue="-1") java.lang.String tableCookie)
      Called when the user visits /. Displays index.html
      Parameters:
      model - Model used to store menu items
      tableCookie - Cookie used to store the selected table
      Returns:
      page (html file) to be loaded.

    • counterRequest

      @RequestMapping(value="menu", method=POST) public java.lang.String counterRequest​(@RequestParam java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> menuCounter)
      Called when the user adds or removes a particular item from their order. Creates a post request. This calls the backend code to add or remove an item from the method.
      Parameters:
      menuCounter - The menuCounter map for the method
      Returns:
      page (html file) to be loaded.

    • submitOrder

      @RequestMapping(value="/menu/submitOrder", method=POST, consumes="application/json") @ResponseBody public java.lang.String submitOrder​(@RequestBody java.lang.String order, @CookieValue(value="staffid",defaultValue="0") java.lang.String stringStaffId, @CookieValue(value="table",defaultValue="-1") java.lang.String tableCookie)
      This method is called when the submit order button is pressed, it assigns an orderId and calls the controller to handle what it has received from the frontend.
      Parameters:
      order - The order.
      stringStaffId - String containing staffId
      tableCookie - String containing user's table number
      Returns:
      The redirection to the appropriate page.

    • needsAssistance

      @RequestMapping(value="/menu/needsAssistance", method=POST) public java.lang.String needsAssistance​(@RequestParam java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> allParams)
      This method is called when the help button is pressed on the menu.
      Parameters:
      allParams - Values from the form to get tablenum from.
      Returns:
      redirection to the appropriate page.
